text: As part of our ongoing framework with the @EnvAgency in the north, the Land & Water team used an #amphibiousexcavator to de-silt a #tidaldrainagechannel at #LordsCloughDrain. üôå Check out the before and after pictures.üì∏ #ThrowbackThursday https://t.co/Wf1rHnGaHe

@helenafmckeown @Bayer @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency @geetiesingh @guardianeco @SoilAssociation @SoilAssocScot @Greenpeace @TheGreenParty @GreenJennyJones @IslingtonTrib @Naturvern @NFFNUK My individual recycling bin is no longer a cause for joy.  Even if all the neighbourhood bins are counted together. Or the country's. Might as well chuck it all in the river with the chemicals and runoff. Governments and corporates change our world. I'll keep doing it but.....
